question.title: Reverse the array
question.content:
Given an array with N elements, the task is to reverse all the array elements and print the reversed array.

Input Format:

The first line contains an integer N representing the size of the array.

The second line contains N space-separated integers representing the elements of the array.

Output Format:

The only line of the output prints N space-separated integers representing the Reversed array elements.
Constraints:
1 <= N <= 10^3
1 <= arr[i] <= 10^9
1 <= K < N
Sample Input:
8
7 5 2 11 2 43 1 10
Sample Output:
10 1 43 2 11 2 5 7
Explanation of Sample Input:
Here the elements have been reversed.

rephrased.body: Given an array of N integers, reverse the order of the elements in the array and print the reversed array.
constraints: 1 <= K < N (This constraint is not used in the original problem, so removing it)

testcases.explanation: The array elements have been reversed.
An array with a single element remains the same when reversed.
